questionTitle: When you deploy an application on Google’s PaaS App Engine cloud service, the Administration Console provides you with the which of the following monitoring capabilities?
questionExplanation: However, you have almost no operational control.

questionOption1: In the cloud, the particular service model you are using directly affects the type of monitoring you are responsible for
questionOption2: In AaaS, you can alter aspects of your deployment
questionOption3: You can monitor your usage of resources through Amazon CloudWatch
questionExplanation: In IaaS, you can alter aspects of your deployment.

questionTitle: Which of the following provides tools for managing Windows servers and desktops?
questionExplanation: Microsoft System Center is an example of how management products are being adapted for the cloud.

questionTitle: Which of the following is not a phase of cloud lifecycle management?
questionOption1: The definition of the service as a template for creating instances
questionOption3: Management of the operation of instances and routine maintenance
questionExplanation: A management program has to touch on each of the six different stages in that lifecycle.

questionOption1: Google App Engine lets you deploy the application and monitor it
questionOption2: From the standpoint of the client, a cloud service provider is different than any other networked service
questionOption3: The full range of network management capabilities may be brought to bear to solve mobile, desktop, and local server issues
questionExplanation: From the standpoint of the client, a cloud service provider is different than any other networked service.

questionTitle: Which of the following is the Virtual machine conversion cloud?
questionExplanation: BMC Cloud Computing Initiative is used for Cloud planning, lifecycle management, optimization, and guidance.

questionTitle: _______ is Microsoft’s cloud-based management service for Windows systems.
questionExplanation: The management services include an Operations Manager, the Windows Service Update Service (WSUS), a Configuration Manager for asset management, a Data Protection Manager, and a Virtual Machine Manager, among other components.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a virtualization provisioning system that will be rolled into Dell’s AIM?
questionExplanation: AIM stands for Advanced Infrastructure Manager.

questionTitle: Which of the following is used for Web site monitoring and analytics?
questionExplanation: Ganglia is a distributed network monitoring software.

questionTitle: Which of the following is used for performance management for virtualized Java Apps with VMware integration?
questionExplanation: Internetseer is a Web site monitoring service.
